title: Real Ninja Reviews
description:
Podcast featuring news, reviews, and discussions on Anime, Video Games, Comics/Manga, Movies/TV, Hip-Hop, and sports... n00bs and vets of the culture are equally welcome, we are a safe and nondiscriminatory space for all to enjoy their fan-hood! Come listen to and chill with some Real “Ninjas"

Connect with us here: https://linktr.ee/RealNinjaReviewsPodcast

title: Like a Fish Needs a Starship: A Bitterly Feminist Sci-Fi Podcast
description: On Like a Fish Needs a Starship, hosts Steph and Kat are bad-ass feminist sci-fi nerds, and aren't afraid to admit it.  Join us as we talk about sci-fi television, movies, literature, and other things  that tickle our inner nerd (and some things that don't).  Because It's Always About Gender, we have no shame in viewing it all through a feminist lens, but have no fear - there are lots of laughs along the way. Of course, we also enjoy chatting about fashion, makeup, and playing a good game of FMK...but hey, no one's perfect, right?

title: The Ol' Timey Spectral Hour
description: Welcome to The Ol' Timey Spectral Hour, an award winning, multi-episodic scripted horror podcast unveiling paranormal hauntings, sinister ghosts, & problematic phantoms based off of true terror tales & lore. Turn the lights off, turn your volume up to 10, & let the spooky stories begin! (*Full list of episodic cast/audio credits on IMDB*)

title: The Geek Realm with Hose
description: A podcast for all the geeks in the world to speak on many topics, regarding comics, film, tv and more!

title: The Sci-Fi Wise Guys
description: An insight/comedy podcast where two unqualified friends break down and riff on straight-to-stream sci-fi and fantasy films. Join the Sci-Fi Wise Guys as they aim for art but land in comedy.

title: Фантастические рассказы
description:
Истории о героях, слабых и сильных, или - о тех, кто только кажется героем, с суперспособностями и без. Накопившиеся фантастические рассказы об альтернативных реальностях, катастрофах и изменившемся мире.

Ищите рассказы также на платформе youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@jackmorrine/videos

title: Godzilla Roundtable
description: A Godzilla Podcast dedicated to chronicling the big Dinosaur's history in order featuring Mulder/Fae, TalesOfNine/ToN and Crashfan1ooo/Crash with a focus on diversity. Logo artwork done by Dan Hartles. Proud member of Fears, Futures, and Fossils.

title: Hawkins, Do You Copy?
description:
We are Ren and Emily and, every weekend, we're broadcasting from Cerebro - to you - talking all things Stranger Things. So, Hawkins, Do You Copy?
Over and out.

Six friends maneuver learning the Lancer System and a story involving mechs, clandestine intergovernmental organizations, and twisting political schemes, playing as a very dysfunctional group of Lancers. 

General warnings for: Violence, Death, Drug Use

title: The Cryptwins
description: My brother and I explore the different possible cryptids in each of the 50 states in the USA.

title: BedtimeSCP
description: Hello, I read SCP articles, attempting to keep to as true to the article as possible.

description: Dystopia? Check. Every episode is either about some fresh new hell that was probably predicted in a cyberpunk story, or some topic that could be viewed through a cyberpunk lens. Produced in affiliation with neondystopia.com

description: A group of dorks bringing their thought, perspectives, and humor to a galaxy far, far away! Whether you are into the the pre-Disney expanded universe, the new Disney canon, or you just like watching the movies, we have something for you!!!!

description: Pickled Minds podcast is a podcast where others and I try to figure out the world. We will talk about life experiences, goals and even the unknown. Please tune and listen if you are looking for something different.

title: Space Fuckers

Sluts in space.

https://spacefuckerspodcast.com/

title: Geekin' Out Over Star Wars
description: Just a couple of friends geeking out over all things Star Wars! Join us as we discuss everything going on in our favorite Galaxy Far Far Away... From the High Republic to the Rise of the First Order, across books, video games, and every other form of media you can imagine, we're here to talk about it all.

title: The Quest for Identity
description: The audio from the short story The Quest for Identity, created and written for 6039CRWRI.

title: Villainous Cinema
description:
What’s up, Villains?! Come on in, take off yer shoes, sit down, have a drink or a smoke, cure what ails ya…


Welcome to Villainous Cinema! A show dedicated to watching B-Movies, Cult Classics, & VHS Trash so you don’t have to w/ your host, Evan Landon!

LIKE, SHARE, SUBSCRIBE, & ENJOY!

title: Not-Buff Film Buffs
description: Two movie nerds analyze films and film franchises, explore why they work (or don't) and generally geek for 2 to 3 hours at a time. Think Siskel and Ebert, only half the age, wisdom and dignity.

title: 4Score
description: 4 Score and 2 semesters ago, our founding conspiracists by the names of DJ, Ish, Max, and David started a podcast. 4Score covers the mysteries of the world and debate if they exist, or are illusions.

title: Generation: Cyberpunk
description:
In this podcast, discussion is made on all aspects of Cyberpunk. From movies and books to tabletop and video games. With new episodes each week, we hope to share our love for this genre. Voices include: Your host Brenden "Lupus Daemon" Sandifer, English Correspondent Sami “The Wolf” Knight, Mouth of reason Barry "Gurdek/Khzhak" Goldberg, Doppelgänger Gregory “Grim” Sandifer, the ever-distracted Melody, and the long-winded Wes.

The Podcast Twitter: https://twitter.com/GenCyberpunkPod

title: Projects are prophecies, prophecies are projects
description:
Projects are prophecies, prophecies are projects is a series of talks with artists, curators, writers and other creatives. In the first season, you can hear Stine Deja, Cécile B. Evans, Luca Lo Pinto and Jeanne Graff talk about the future through their own practices. The goal is to understand how they approach imagination and creation. 
Talks are in English and are moderated by Natalija Paunić, in partnership with British Council and supported by LUX and Eugster || Belgrade.
Sound edit: Žarko Komar, visuals: Stefan Unković

title: The Waystation
description:
The crew of an orbital station discovers a strange celestial object, creating something that threatens to enmesh them all. Armed with the recordings of the events, a federal agent scours the logs and entries of the crew in search of the truth behind the station's mysterious destruction.

Your worst enemy is you.

https://twitter.com/waystation_pod

title: The Battle BrotherCast
description: Two Battle Brothers discussing the intricacies of the Warhammer 40,000 universe and the mountains of lore that accompanies it. Join us as we delve into lore with funny interpretations, random segues, stories, and good times.

title: Marvel Super Awesome Super Show
description: Andrew and John Creech give their weekly take on all things Marvel! Starting with the season finale and making of WandaVision and going until... well, who knows when we'll stop!

title: Missives from a New Ghost Town
description: Utopia means "no place," but here are some voice memos from everywhere.

title: Southern Gothic Gaming
description:
A group of friends playing tabletop RPG games mostly using the World of Darkness system.

Formerly Knoxville by Night

title: Uncanny Treks
description: In this podcast, we explore the many different worlds of Star Trek, Babylon 5, Marvel, DC Comics, and everything in between.

title: Project: Maternity
description: This story follows the experience that Noah and Ryan went through while participating in an experiment that... they are not even sure what it is.

title: The Sonic Corridor
description: Welcome to The Sonic Corridor, where you will find doorways to confounding, twisted and stupefying stories...shall we take a walk?

title: Fulmar's Folly
description:
Two years after civilisation collapsed from a terrifying zombie like pandemic, the Cooper family fight for survival aboard their small sailboat Fulmar’s Folly. Hunted by pirates, haunted by the infected and forever battling the sea herself - each episode is told from a different family members point of view.

Fulmar’s Folly will test your anxiety, provoke your emotions and ultimately take you on an unforgettable journey - a zombie drama set at sea.

title: Star Wars: Showdown On Iceball Station
description:
An original Star Wars RPG adventure set during the Legends/EU timeline. 

In the midst of the Yuuzhan Vong invasion of the Galaxy, the Jedi Praxeum has sent two Knights to a remote, frozen world where they must work with the local detective to unlock an ancient secret...

Cast:

Zeef, Gungan Detective (played by Kyle Katarn)
Narset Jinn, Jedi Knight (played by Bendu)
Xavix Silverstar, Jedi Master (played by David Gold)
Worram of Ithor, pilot (played by Dan Lyons)
Game Master Lurch Lurchington (played by himself)

This RPG adventure uses the Star Wars ruleset established by Fantasy Flight Games. 
Cover art by Martin Sobr.

title: A STARK CONTRAST
description: A tale of two Marvels! Join Geoffrey, a Marvel Cinematic nerd, and Dai, a long-time comic book aficionado, as they discuss all things MARVEL! How do the worlds of comic book canon and cinema collide? Which origin stories differ? Why IS Gamora? Stay tuned as we explore the Marvel Universe from panel to picture and discuss the stark contrasts (or lack thereof) in-between.

title: Podcast Heroes
description: Podcast Heroes discusses any and all superhero-related matters bringing in discussions of comics, movies, tv shows, and other sources with an interesting take from two brothers. It's 70% superheroes and 30% tangent random thoughts.

title: Jump In The Void
description: Jump In The Void is a podcast hosted by Tavien . Jump in the void with us as we talk about anime, super hero's, real life experiences and our interest that we find in void. So jump in void and get lost!!!!

title: The Plocast
description: Welcome to The Plocast! We're Evan and Paul, and we are huge Star Wars fans. We make content discussing, reviewing, and reacting to any and all Star Wars content, and you can find a lot of our content on our YouTube channel, The Plocast! But here, we'll upload our longer videos (reviews, rankings, breakdowns, etc.), for those who'd like to listen through a podcast.

title: Interface, Audio Chapters
description:
Welcome to the World-City of Thousel, the sixth iteration of life on the planet. These are the recordings of the people of Thousel. Thousel is believed to be the second longest iteration of life, and the overall most prosperous compared to what we know about the past five iterations. Medicine and technology have all progressed abundantly, and the world itself has been turned into one great city, governed and managed by the Governmental-Company Alliance, or the GCA. 

These particular recordings concern the discovery of a peculiar machine. When two very different people find themselves bound by the fate of one mysterious bot, life in the World-City begins to change...
A more detailed trigger warning can be found with each written chapter on the main site. As a general rule of thumb, this story should be considered content for mature audiences. Violence is abundant throughout the world of Thousel, and multiple characters regularly deal with very real mental health struggles that could be triggering for readers. There will be graphic language (both fictional and real-world) and descriptions of altogether not-very-happy scenes.

Interface is a webnovel written by iwriterobots. You can read the story at iwriterobots.com, or listen to the audio chapters on spotify. Audio chapters are read and recorded by Henry Hales. If you like the show, consider supporting the production of the story and audio chapters under the support tab at the main site, iwriterobots.com.

title: The ManNerd Podcast
description: Join me on a magical journey of nerdom. The ManNerd brings you a nerdy variety show. Do you like real play DND podcasts? Do you like interviews with awesome nerds? Do you like uplifting content? How about original stories that draw you in? And even movie reviews and discussions? We have it all here.

title: Kate's Bunker
description: Open your minds, sheep! Fictional conspiracy radio comedy has arrived. Kate’s Bunker is the simple story of a conspiracy theory pod-caster living in an underground bunker searching for the truth, navigating a messy divorce, and trying to figure out why a mysterious building super is appearing in her underground bunker to do repairs while interviewing guests.  The truth is down here!

title: Down The Rabbit Hole Productions
description: Podcast with 3 co-hosts that talk about beyond the meaning of things. sharing classic and funny stories.

title: Burdened with Glorious Podcast
description: Hosts Maureen and Megan take a deep dive into the lore of Marvel's trickster god Loki, from his new TV show to the original comics to everything in between, with detours into fandom, pop culture, and more.

title: Geek Speak Last Week
description: Three friends discuss the pop culture news of the week, covering a plethora of topics and speak about their connection to & love of all things GEEK!

title: Star Wars Infinite
description: Whether we became Star Wars fans last week or in the 1970s, our love for the saga is infinite. Join me, Star Wars Infinite, every Friday as I delve into the intrigue and excitement of a galaxy far, far away!

title: Tell No Tales
description:
Leo Quinn works for Better Place, the world leader in ghost removal, but they’re having some doubts about the ethics of their work. They’re building a device that should let them capture the voices of ghosts, to prove once and for all that Better Place needs to start treating spirits with the humanity they deserve – and to unravel some mysteries in the process.

Tell No Tales is a serialised fiction podcast — to hear the story unfold, we recommend starting from episode one

title: DeltaWolves - A Dystopian/Sci-Fi Audio Movie
description: DeltaWolves: A revolutionary new dystopian/science fiction podcast, which pushes the envelope of creativity using an audio podcast experience. This' a movie experience without the visual. Listen to action-packed episodes, that will leave you jumping out of your seat. So close your eyes, and let your mind's imagination visualize a new world.

title: The Banter Book Club
description: John and Taylor talk about their favorite book series! The first is The King Killer Chronicles, the first book; The Name of the Wind by Patrick Rothfus. They talk over the series as they recount the story so be sure to read the book if you want to know what's going.

title: Twin Sun Talks
description: Welcome to Twin Sun Talks! This is the best podcast for both devoted and casual Star Wars fans. Whether you're trying to bolster your knowledge, wanting a starting point to dive into the franchise, or wanting some fresh takes on the existing canon, this podcast is for you! Whenever you are ready to take your first steps into this larger world, come and let us talk at you... May the Force be with you!

title: A Nightmare On Their Street
description: Hey friend! A Nightmare On Their Street is a combination of all things that make you lock your doors and check under your bed at night, whether it be true crime, hauntings, or a mysterious disappearance, your host Lauren is here to scare the sh*t out of you.

title: BodyBag Podcast
description:
We are two strangers who came together through our love of horror movies, and decided to make a podcast reviewing horror new and old. We will tell you what we like and what we dislike and whether or not the movie is worth watching and be warned there will be spoilers. 
https://linktr.ee/Bodybagpodcast

title: Super Whiskey Bros
description: Just two brothers who share a love of fantasy, video games, books, cigars, and, of course, whiskey.

title: The Dark Volumes Podcast
description:
Like horror stories? Like audio books? Like to be read to by a voice as soft as black velvet and as sinister as a phantom?

The Dark Volumes podcast brings you monthly stories from the greats such as H.P. Lovecraft, Edgar Allan Poe, Mary Shelley, Robert Chambers, and others. There's some commentary, sure, but it's all about the stories, here.

Turn off the lights, pour some wine, and (maybe) get under the covers. The Dark Volumes are here to remind you why you should be afraid of the dark.

title: Melanin Macabre
description: A brand-new spooky podcast that discusses a wide array of creepy topics, such as myths, legends, and true crime cases that focus mainly on BIPOC communities. Nothing is too creepy for Melanin Macabre!

title: The Exciting Adventures of Space Monkey: a sci-fi radio play
description: This is primarily a story-podcast, or more accurately, a sci-fi radio play. It's about a monkey and his adventures through time and space. His name is Space Monkey. This tale has been created in the style and spirit of the old sci-fi radio plays and stories. Among other things, you may find a few off-the-wall retro-radio commercials, additional mini audio-dramas, and so much more! So, sit back, relax, and enjoy the show!

title: Conversations at Midnight
description: Conversations at Midnight is a podcast focused on the discovery of the “more” in life; that through deep conversation and determined investigating,  I might, with humility and passion, help illuminate the more obscure, darker and mysterious aspects of this ancient planet we call Earth. This podcast is designed to pay homage and respect to what I believe to be serious topics. From the missing 411, to cryptozoology, aliens and the paranormal, my goal is to provide listeners information without jest or mockery, so that I may not mistakenly make light of a subject many are already too embarrassed or afraid to talk about. I strive to remain family friendly; there will be no profanities or inappropriate conversations. That being said, I advice viewers to still remain  cautious when listening, as these subject matters might prove too much for some audiences to handle, or too frightening for any younger listeners. Thank you so much for tuning in, and I hope my voice will help bring comfort to your hearts.

title: Split Oak Lane
description: Split Oak Lane is a podcast presented as a series of audio logs by an apartment manager as he searches for a missing tenant--and discovers the secrets of the mysterious complex along the way.

title: Mortuus Est: Legacy
description: Breaking free, falling in love, and secrets and lies. Mortuus Est: Legacy is a new audio drama podcast that follows the aftermath of the death of Rafael Guerrero. His fiancée, Elaina, is left behind to pick up the pieces as her future becomes intertwined with his shadowed past.

title: The Starport Inn
description: Federal Agent Weaver is sent to investigate strange disappearances in a quiet coastal town in North Carolina.

title: La Mano Peluda
description: Es un programa de entretenimiento de lo desconocido, insólito y sobrenatural, casos sorprendentes sin explicación lógica. Investigación, reportajes, entrevistas y análisis de las evidencias del más allá.

title: Audio Bard
description:
An Audiobook & Fiction Podcast Channel. All content narrated by a highly trained professional actor.

——————————————————————————————————————————-

My name’s James, I trained at one of the best drama schools in England for four years, East 15 Acting School.

——————————————————————————————————————————-

Now living with brain injury caused chronic fatigue, via this project - I am slowly but surely returning to my craft. 

——————————————————————————————————————————-

Please write a short review, give my channel 5 stars, and share with anyone you know who are into audiobooks.

——————————————————————————————————————————-

Please also subscribe on YouTube ( ‘Audio Bard - Audiobooks’ ) for more content, including coming soon : straight to camera video storytelling / fiction  content.

——————————————————————————————————————————-

If you’d like to support me further? Head to : patreon.com/AUDIOBARD

——————————————————————————————————————————-

Here’s my LinkTree for professional actor links, my other YouTube channel (a Video Podcast / Vlog), Podcast appearances, media interviews etc : LinkTree/James_InksonStevens

——————————————————————————————————————————-

Thank you in advance. :)

title: The Villains Cave
description: Here we dive deep into all of comic history and find what makes a villain a bad guy, how heroes got to where they were and the important stories along the way.
author_name: Kade Cornaby, Jasen King, Cassie Welch

title: We Are Alpharius
description: Unscripted Warhammer shenanigans, warning may cause listeners to wish they were servitors.

title: AveryWorld Stories
description: This is the world where heroes live, mad scientists create, and the stakes are at their highest. Check back for exciting stories that dare you to dream, fill you with the sense of adventure, and allow your imagination to run wild.

title: The Atomless
description:
Using the Starfinder RPG system, The Atomless is an improvised Audio Drama Actual Play following the rag-tag crew of The Patchwork! Join Ayg, the smuggler; Azhaam, the ex-rebellion leader; Dr. Theriac, the religious scientist; and Skye, the radical teenager as they chart their way across the Atomless Sea in this ongoing Starfinder Podcast. What adventures await them in the eternally colorful Atomless Sea? Starring GM or Space God @MatthewEkberg and players @AndreRiveraArt, @momo_obrien, @superdillin and @WerewolfFeels

Enjoying the show?

Support us on Patreon to help us keep the podcast going, and to enjoy sneak peeks of our upcoming content. https://www.patreon.com/theatomless

Get a look at our cast and crew while you listen!

title: Terror por la noche
description: Join us! Listen to our fascination for all the unknown, Urban legends, ghost stories, conspiracy theories, true crime, extraterrestrial life, mythical creatures! And many more!

title: Three Fates Decide - Women Opining on Pop Culture
description: We're three women who chat about our favorite pop culture fandoms and how we relate to them. What we talk about varies every week! What will we talk about next? We decide! Subscribe or follow us on your favorite podcast listening app! For more about us and our show, check out our website: www.threefatesdecide.com. This podcast normally uploads Fridays.

title: Joe's Odd Podcast
description:
plz keep open mind

lmk what ya think!

title: Mysteries on Tap
description:
Paranormal... murder... mysteries... oh my!  These topics always seem to find a way to be the center of our conversations. If you couldn't tell by now, our episodes are barely scripted and exhibit the playful yet comical banter that encompasses our relationship. Come join us at the bar and grab a seat as we share our ideas and dive into some of the many mysteries that may (or may not) surround us. Welcome to Mysteries on Tap!

Check out all new episodes each week at https://mysteriesontap.com

title: Triple Threat Talks
description: Pop Culture, True Crime, Conspiracy Theory. COULD IT GET ANY BETTER?

title: Lost Lake
description: A teenaged student named Ben runs away from home and ends up in a mysterious town called Lost Lake. Ben and his friends end up battling supernatural creatures together, mess time together, open up portals, and discover that everyone seems to be hiding some sort of secret... nothing is as it seems. Everything you hear is a collection of Ben’s cassette tapes. Everything has been logged and recorded from beginning to end.. listen if you dare.

title: Twisted Reality
description: Telling Stories in a Unique way

title: Spirited Spirits
description:
Join Steph and Drew every week as they discuss a new spooky topic while drinking a crafted cocktail. 

Feel free to send us your ghostly experiences at: contactspiritedspirits@gmail.com and follow us on Instagram (@spirited_spirits_podcast) and on Twitter (@SpiritedSpirits).

title: The Dungeon Boiz
description:
The Dungeon Boiz is an exciting, creative, and fun(ny) podcast that uses the framework of the classic tabletop role-playing game ’Dungeons and Dragons’ (5th edition) to tell stories of adventurers setting out to save their towns, cities, worlds, and galaxies. Join us on these journeys as we explore new adventures, encounter dangerous new worlds, and hopefully make new friends along the way. 

​The Dungeon Boiz now presents their first campaign: Stardust Echos. Stardust Echos is a science fiction, high fantasy, Dungeon and Dragons, home brew campaign. Like most D&D campaigns, this will be a game based on choices, imagination, and most of all, fate. Come laugh and explore with us!  

Due to the improv nature of The Dungeon Boiz and other RPG content on our channels, some themes and situations that occur in-game may be difficult for some to handle (may contain mature language and content). Content warnings can always be found in the episode description below. This podcast is 100% intended for mature audiences only.

title: Charnel.FM
description: Real mysteries, true crime, ghost and folk tales, and everything else aimed at raising the hairs on the back of your neck. New episodes every Tuesday morning. GMT.

title: JG Tales
description: I write and read fictional stories of the creepy variety. Topics ranging from everyday life to sci fi. "CreepyPasta".

title: Federation radio - a star trek podcast
description:
Here at Federation radio - a star trek podcast I intend to review every single star trek episode and bring you all in on some of my more interesting theories and opinions. 
feel free to email - federationradiostartrek@gmail.com

title: ALL NIGHT DELI
description: scripted, sci-fi podcast about a Caribbean women-led mafia fighting over their designer drug cartel, when a portal to an alternate earth is discovered

title: POTATO: Possibilities Of Time And Things Overthere
description:
The planet Overthere has discovered Earth.
Earth has no idea where the peace-loving Overthere is, which makes picking a fight with it tricky.

Several years on, Earth is fully ensconced in its inferiority complex, speculation of imminent attack is rife.

And here's our aimless Polly, obliviously bumbling along, only to be rudely interrupted one night by a knock on the door and a visit from a friendly-looking 'alien' who gives her a code to unlock her life, the universe and anything she wants.

Starting with nothing, absolute zero, a pigeon, creativity and playing in the invisible worlds of philosophy, psychology, dreams and faith, how does one create the life they want? What would it be like to live forever? And did your cousin Vince really get abducted all those years ago and returned as a fish finger?

title: Spooky Soup Podcast
description: Just two siblings obsessed with the weird, strange and curious.

title: Memento - Ranking Things Together
description:
My name is Maple, and In this podcast. We rank various things. 
We are all here. 
Together. 
Again.

title: Messages From The Moon (MFTM) Audio Experience
description:
This is the Messages From The Moon (MFTM) Audio Experience. A 3D sonic experience into the cinematic universe of Selene and Vrupv - where the story rises, peaks and crashes in tune with the moon cycle. 

A story telling journey through narration, and carefully curated and mixed tracks to transport you magically into the world of MFTM.

title: Is This Just Fantasy?
description:
The book club where we review all things fantasy! Join Duncan and Geordie as they embark on a quest to track the breadth and history of the fantasy genre, one epic at the time.
Whether you're a fan of book-stopper tomes like Duncan, or lighter YA fantasy like Geordie, we want you to read-along with us. Episodes are released every two weeks, giving you enough to read the book (or skim the synopsis if you're just here for the banter.)

title: Breaking Utopia | The Audiobook Podcast
description: 676 years after the fall of Central City, A Rel, a charismatic rebel, and an unassuming News Censorer find themselves trekking across the land they call Allkline to stop a full-scale invasion on the west. Breaking Utopia is a Scifi/Fantasy novel created by Ian Patrick. The audiobook is narrated by Ian Patrick and edited by Stefan Lampkin.

title: A Podcast of Spurious Morality
description: A Doctor Who & Big Finish Podcast with a rotating group of hosts. https://linktr.ee/spuriouspodcast

title: A MARVELous History
description: We talk about the history of different marvel characters and their counterparts or multiverse

title: roleplayingdegenerates
description: Dungeons and Dragons was once considered to be a strange and misunderstood game. Now the role-playing based adventure is one of the biggest, most unique, and all around fun experiences in the gaming world. We are here to talk about the past, present, and future of the game that is taking the world by storm!

title: 99 Nerds
description:
The greatest Nerd Podcast in the galaxy. 
On a scale of 1 to Nerd, we're a 99.

title: Blerd City
description: It’s not often that you get to meet your doppelganger. Even less so that you get to do a podcast with them. Meech and Meech presents Blerd City, a journey through the nebula of nerdom, presented from the unique perspective of two people that share the same name. Anime, cartoons, comics, movies, games we got it. Join us as we laugh, but also get deep on this new adventure.

title: Renewal: A Star Trek Fan Production
description: Renewal comes in many forms. Follow Admiral Anders Ownsby and the Crew of the Starship Resurgence as they seek out new life and new civilizations in the aftermath of the devastating Iconian War and the fallout that came with it. Set in 2408, Rift Point Productions brings you our take of the Star Trek Universe. Follow us for more or join our discord at https://discord.gg/Ex6xtys2E6

title: 2Geeks1Noob
description:
We gather friends of similar interests (and maybe not so similar) to discuss, joke, learn more about and generally have fun with "Geek Culture".

Make sure to follow us on instagram @2geeks1noob for updates on new episodes!
Also, to answer any of the listener questions we pose to you guys, email us at 2geeks1noobpodcast@gmail.com

title: Dandy Chase & The Abominable Case
description: In this surreal tale, disoriented detective Dandy Chase attempts to remember where he was last night as the ensuing events continue to become more and more muddled.

title: The Future
description:
A novel by Stefan Molyneux, host of Freedomain - the largest and most popular philosophy show in the world!

www.freedomain.com

Centuries in the future, an old man awakes from cryogenic sleep to face the judgement of a utopian society that barely survived his past abuse of power. In the vein of 'Atlas Shrugged, philosophy, philosopher Stefan Molyneux has created a compelling and powerful work of imagination. He vividly describes the wonderful future that mankind can achieve - and the barriers to getting there - and all that we need to leave behind to finally live in peace...

title: The Galactic Escape
description:
By 2040, Global Warming of Earth's atmosphere has been declared irreversible with current technology. Although the first sustained and contained nuclear fusion reaction was achieved in 2035 and the first power plant was built in 2042, fossil fuel emissions continue to climb. in 2044, scientists developed antimatter in Earth orbit, which led to the successful development of and interstellar warp drive in 2049. This enabled the launch of an inter-stellar probe in 2055 to a habitable planet identified in another star system. Ross 128b, an ocean planet, promised a new home for humanity. Listen to our podcast, visit our website and watch for release of our NFT collection.

Please follow us on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/TheGalacticEscape/

description:
This episode is 3 minutes... An exciting new SciFi novel, read by the author, Steve Burgess, one excellent chapter at a time.

Steve Burgess is the head digital forensicist at BurgessForensics.com and recent president of a transformative tech advocacy nonprofit, The Foresight Institute. And your author.

This 10 episodic podcast is a non-commercial and non-monetized project. Each student in the college's radio program must run a semester-long show. Interstellar Soundwaves is mine. 

Logo created by thePrimaRoxas on Twitter!

title: Adventures in Oerth
description:
Welcome to our tabletop campaign!  We are just a bunch of friends getting together playing D&D or Pathfinder in our custom world setting.  Some of us are veterans from 2nd edition, some of us newcomers to the game.  We all enjoy playing and having fun.  
Pull up a chair and enjoy as we share our misadventures.  

Please check out our wiki site where you can find background on the world and follow campaign notes.  
https://lordsofhack.com/rejectcompany

Leave us feedback at https://www.reddit.com/r/AdventuresInOerth/

title: Moonbreaker: Tales from the Reaches
description: Blast off to adventure in Moonbreaker: Tales from the Reaches! This fully produced audio drama series explores the world and characters of Moonbreaker, the brand new digital tabletop strategy game by Unknown Worlds Entertainment (Subnautica, Natural Selection) and from the mind of acclaimed author Brandon Sanderson (The Mistborn Series). Experience the Reaches through a series of unique stories that feature a diverse cast of characters, both new and familiar to fans of the game, voiced by some of the industry's top talent including JB Blanc, Matthew Mercer, and Khaya Fraites. The audio drama series, written by Dan Wells, kicks off on September 29, 2022 when Moonbreaker launches into Early Access on Steam!

title: Anno Amagium
description:
A long-form, contemporary fantasy series following wizard detectives in a world where everyone commands the power of magic. Supported by patrons of Patreon.com/AnnoAmagium.

---
The scholar-warriors of the Amagium swear themselves to a sacred charge: governing humanity’s inherent capacity to wield magic. Through a complex licensure system, they decree which spells and arcane artifice are permissible for public, “asfalis” use.

Arroyo, The City of Bridges and Roses, is a suburb of Los Angeles that seems like it crawled out of a storybook. Five palatial terraces of land are connected by a myriad of bridges over gulches where the brambles of a colossal, petrified rose briar reside. But this seemingly-tranquil city seethes with dark secrets and otherworldly threats amass in its shadows.

Sevardin Harker, a newly minted member of the Amagium’s Peacekeeping Force, is thrust into the deep end on his second day on the job, when he has a life-threatening encounter with a form of magic most people believe to be fiction.

Meanwhile, Hace Matthews and Alinore Valmont, two precocious aspiring peacekeepers, begin their 11-year matriculation at Arroyo’s Athenaeum, the Amagium’s rigorous training ground...
---

For more episodes, references, and other information, please visit AnnoAmagium.com. I hope you enjoy the story! If it resonates, please share it with fellow fantasy fans, and consider backing us to fund more episodes. Thank you for listening!  -Hank

title: Multiverse of Destiny Series
description: A woman is thrust into a magical alternative universe world and must survive.

title: Meenah's Tirith
description: All things Lord of the Rings! Join me as I discuss and answer all your questions about LOTR, Rings of Power, Tolkien and more!

title: Transilvania Storys Telling
description:
Bienvenido al canal de un narrador. Es un joven comunidad donde publico mis historias y crezco como narrador y escritor. 

Es una comunidad donde se publican historias y relatos de miedo, terror, suspense, misterio y anécdotas relacionados con los mismo .  Donde los enigmas y las reglas de mas extraña procedencia son el pan de cada día.

Esta comunidad crece gracias a vosotros, por eso, si queréis contar una anécdota hacedlo en el apartado de correos :

 trasilvaniastorysteling@gmail.com

Recuerda siempre, la mejor historia no es la que se cuenta o escucha por el día o por la noche, si no la que se cuenta con el corazón . La que transmite sentimientos  , honestidad y sinceridad y sobre todo ,para entretener y enseñar algo . 

Si lo que buscas son historias de terror que te hagan pensar, interactuar con la comunidad y conmigo adivinando adivinanzas, ver metáforas y grotescas apariciones de monstruos que a Lovecraft le helarían la sangre, ven, únetenos .

¿A que esperas ? 

¡ Visita mi canal de YouTube si quieres ver las ultimas historias en ser publicadas !

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHHLEhVtZpaJ0PCBZt43KkQ

title: GHOULS TIME

Hosted by your favorite ghouls, Meg, Jasmin, Mallory, & Alisha. We’re a group of cousins that love all things spooky and all things Disney. Tune in every week to learn about Disney facts or to hear a spooky story that will make your hair stand up.

title: Experiment 31E
description: A scientist is attempting a dangerous experiment in this Frankenstein-inspired, speculative fiction podcast that takes place during an alternate version of the Victorian era. As the scientist seeks to perfect her formula and find a suitable specimen for testing, unexpected threats rear their heads while her own motives lurk in the dark. Written and performed by Lauren Triola, with music by Shannon Triola, new episodes will be released every other Monday. Transcripts available at www.experiment31e.com.

title: Datacrons - Ein Star Wars Lorecast
description: Hier plaudern Kryos, Yrm und Leif in lockerer Atmosphäre über die alte, wie auch die neue Lore von Star Wars. Kryos nimmt dabei die Rolle des Erzählers ein, während Yrm ein absoluter Neueinsteiger in der erweiterten Geschichte von Star Wars ist. Leif, unser wandelndes Lexikon, unterstützt uns dabei mit seinem breiten Wissen über die heute als "Legends" bekannten Geschichten. Lehnt euch zurück, schnappt euch ein kühles Getränk und genießt die Reise durch eine weit, weit entfernte Galaxis.

title: El gato sobre la escoba. Casas encantandas: Harrisville
description:
En el invierno de 1970, Royer y Carolyn Perron se trasladaron al condado de Providence, en Rhode Island. 
Pero aquella vetusta granja guardaba secretos, secretos oscuros y aterradores que empañarían cualquier atisbo de felicidad que la familia Perron pudiera tener. 
Una década luchando contra espíritus enfurecidos y demonios.

description: Hello, Earthlings and Spacelings! ⭐🛸 This is the FANTAJI PODCAST, where we discuss sci-fi and fantasy books you’ll probably never read. Is it too old? Is the cover too weird? Did you already see the movie? With your host, Erika Brickley, we'll find out. Check out our Instagram page (@ErikaBrickley) to learn more!

title: Sci-fi Unchained
description: Join a greater science fiction discussion! Theory, philosophy, in depth analysis, conspiracy! From Star Wars to C'thulu, lets delve into it all together. Come, unchain your brain!

title: RELATOS REALES DE TERROR
description: Relatos Reales de Terror de Efecto Radio. Es un Pódcast donde se cuentan historias de terror, fantasmas o sobrenaturales; pero de la vida real. Algunas de estas historias me han sucedido y otras las personas las han compartido o han enviado a investigacionesdemisterio@gmail.com.

title: TrekToWho
description:
What happens when a Trekkie and a Whovian get together with a mission to convert each other?
Find out as Phoenyx and Stu take it in turns to show off episodes of Star Trek and Doctor Who - all with the aim of getting each other to love "their" show!
Experience the highs and lows of each series and come with us for the ride as we travel from Trek To Who!

title: Hard Knocks Sorority
description: Welcome to the Hard Knocks Sorority PodCast, a Shadowrun 4th Edition Actual Play Podcast. My name is Paul, and I am your host and GM. Get in touch with us on our Discord server https://discord.gg/2rg6yyHeHF . The Player Characters are given voice and agency by Veronika playing Cecile, Aka "College Girl" a literal college girl who finds herself abruptly entangled with the 6th world's shadows. Elizabeth playing Grace aka "Nightingale" a literal pony on a quixotic self-imposed research expedition to the 6th World. Valerie playing Ali aka "Boxer", ex-merc and literal Cat woman who now plys the shadows in search of redemption. And finally Kat playing "Diendre" an elven ex-cop who is in search of her brother in Seattle and is literally prettier than an elf has any right to be. Follow along as we muddle our way through the Shadowrun 4th Edition rules. We would love to hear from you on Discord. Intro and Outro (?) music by Tracemineral.

title: STYX
description:
Blake Wayman was a cop until a criminal syndicate had Blake and his wife killed... there's only one problem: Blake didn't stay dead. Now Wayman is a wheelchair bound P.I. with a gift. He can walk the streets of Underworld City, a purgatory on the banks of the River Styx, run by the mysterious Boatman, teeming with lost souls, spiritual forces, and long dead gangsters. There Wayman searches for his lost love and solves crimes no one else can, bringing justice from beyond the grave... Styx is the fictional supernatural noir detective series you didn't know you were waiting for. Follow us on Twitter at @TheStyxPodcast or support us on the web:

www.ko-fi.com/styxpodcast

www.styxpodcast.com

title: THE Masquerading Podcast
description:
Masquerading is THE Social Fiction Community.

You could be into LARP, Anime, you could be a lookalike, you could be a huge Doctor Who fan, be a Trekkie or even an avid Star Wars fan…. Either way, this podcast could be just what you're looking for.

Masquerading.com allows you to BE WHO YOU WANT TO BE… in costume, in character and following events.

Where else can you say that you are going to 'Obliterator a planet', or 'take somebody out', yes guys, you can be totally in character on Masquerading.com

So to start, I will be interviewing people who are already Masquerading on Masquerading.com!

I'll be finding out what made them start cosplaying, what inspires them, how they make their own costumes, how do they get into character, and more importantly, how do they stay in character!

title: WildTrials
description: A high octane, mech racing audio drama! Welcome to the WildTrials, where pilots race transforming mechs against each other in order to win all their hearts desire! For Abe Soriano, he's only desired one thing--to stand out from the shadow of his older brother. But when his brother finds himself entangled in darkness, Abe throws himself into the WildTrials to save him, working with a ragtag team to face dangerous puzzles, tough opponents, and hidden secrets. Can Abe speed through the dangers that lie ahead and save all that's precious to him? Or will he loose it all to...the WildTrials?!

title: Records Of The Republic
description: Hey all you Star Wars fans! Welcome to Records of the Republic, a podcast by Wade and Kevin, two friends who have a mutual adoration for all things Star Wars. Strap yourself in (and don’t get cocky) as we venture out on this fun journey discussing all the things we love about Star Wars, from canon to legends to the old EU and more!

Una minaccia incombe sull'isola di Coral Marittimo e la galaverna sta per abbattersi sul mare.

Il Guardiano dell'isola è senza forze, ed il male si prepara a carpire le anime dei suoi abitanti.

L'unica speranza di salvezza ricade su Dennis, un ragazzo di 19 anni che dovrà scoprire le sue origini ed abbracciare la sua missione, o cadere insieme alla sua gente.

Riusciranno Rudy e Nazar a risvegliare il potere di Dennis prima che sia troppo tardi, o il gelo coprirà ogni cosa?

title: Leggi con calma
description:
ATTENZIONE: questa sinossi potrebbe contenere spoiler della trama, anche se l'autore non ritiene che siano tali; ma è anche da considerare che l'autore gradisce molto conoscere il finale di un film per poi gustarsi il come si arrivi a quella conclusione...

Sinossi: Una mail misteriosa, inviata da una persona che non potrebbe farlo in quel momento. Una corsa contro il tempo senza sapere perché e cosa sta succedendo.

Attraversando a bordo del suo furgone arancione un intero universo, Oscar tornerà dalla sua amata Elena.

Elena capirà quanto ama il suo uomo sapendolo perso nell'immensità dello spazio.

Entrambi riusciranno a collaborare per il medesimo fine senza necessità di parlarsi, e scopriranno di conoscere l'uno dell'altra molto più di quanto non immaginassero fino a quel momento.

“Leggi con calma” è profetico nella sua apparente contraddizione con il contesto, in cui si richiede rapidità di pensiero e di azione. La calma richiesta è più una qualità zen, che una spinta verso la fretta sconsiderata.

Vorrei ringraziare Douglas Noel Adams per quello che ha fatto per l'umanità.

title: Creature Feature
description:
A creature of the week series featuring a group of horror enthusiasts “The Ghoul Gang” investigating strange happenings in the town of River’s End.

River’s End, once a bustling center of industry, is now a sleepy post-industrial retirement community whose best days seem regulated to the past with multiple boarded storefronts on Main Street and the last manufacturing plant STEELAM (once a cornerstone) set to layoff half its remaining workers. The only substantial employer left is ONECORP a biotech and pharmaceutical giant with links to both the town’s founders: the Langston Family, and the military. OneCorp’s lab, research and manufacturing facility looms on the north side of Lethe River jutting out of Weir Forest, frankensteined onto the site of the old observatory. It is here that the brilliant but haunted Dr. Lee Hux tests a unique antipsychotic "EtherX" using a VR mask called “A REBOURS” (“Against Nature”) on a man known only as The Subject.

This mysterious entity possesses a unique ability to deafen all those within its vicinity, leaving them completely unable to hear. The origins and nature of this creature are shrouded in mystery.

In the first episode, we follow the story of Harry, who experiences the deafening silence caused by the creature while out on a nighttime walk. Harry's encounter with the creature leads him on a journey to uncover the secrets surrounding this enigmatic being.

Join us as we delve into the world of the creature, exploring its origins and the impact it has had on those who have encountered it. Experience the eerie silence that surrounds this mysterious being and uncover the secrets that lie within. This is "The Silence."

title: Silas Gnaw
description:
What does terror mean to you?

In this world, fear arrives not in the form of ghosts or demons, spirits or vampires. Instead, it is the faintest touch at the back of your neck — a gnawing sense that something is wrong.

Silas Gnaw is a horror anthology podcast that tells stories of guilt, madness, horror and peculiarity. The characters who navigate these pockets of darkness are everyday people. A former convict trying to feed his family. A failed artist looking for inspiration. A young woman in love. But the nightmares they face get to the heart of what it means to look in the mirror and see nothing worth salvaging.

New episodes on the third Tuesday of every month. For episodes with visuals, check out Youtube.com/@silasgnaw. For more information, email silasgnaw@gmail.com.

title: The Red Alert Podcast (TRAP)
description:
Welcome to "The Red Alert Podcast," affectionately know as TRAP. The ultimate Star Trek fan experience! Join filmmaker Stuart Gilmartin and international DJ Natasha Kitty Katt as they boldly explore the final frontier of Star Trek's vast universe. Strap yourselves in and prepare for a warp-speed journey through the iconic franchise that has captivated generations.

Hosted by two passionate Trekkies, "The Red Alert Podcast" takes you on an exhilarating exploration of the Star Trek universe, spanning over five decades of captivating storytelling. Stuart Gilmartin, a talented filmmaker with a keen eye for detail and cinematography, brings his cinematic expertise to the discussion, while Natasha Kitty Katt, a renowned Music Producer/DJ known for her infectious energy and love for sci-fi, infuses the show with enthusiasm and a vibrant musical touch.

Every episode, Stuart and Natasha dive deep into the various Star Trek series, including the groundbreaking original series, the beloved Next Generation, the action-packed Deep Space Nine, the thrilling Voyager, the prequel Enterprise, and the gripping Discovery and Picard series. They analyze each episode, dissecting the complex characters, intriguing storylines, and thought-provoking themes that have made Star Trek a cultural phenomenon.

"The Red Alert Podcast" offers an inclusive and engaging experience for both longtime fans and newcomers to the Star Trek universe. Stuart and Natasha bring their own unique perspectives to the table, fostering lively discussions and providing fresh insights into the series' iconic moments, memorable characters, and the moral and ethical dilemmas that have defined the franchise.

But the podcast doesn't stop there. "The Red Alert Podcast" also delves into the wider Star Trek universe, including the ever-expanding roster of movies, novels, comics, and even fan theories. Expect engaging interviews with special guests, including actors, writers, and other notable figures from the Star Trek community, who share their behind-the-scenes experiences and insider knowledge.

With each episode, "The Red Alert Podcast" creates a bridge between the fans and the captivating world of Star Trek. Whether you're a seasoned Trekkie or just beginning your voyage, Stuart Gilmartin and Natasha Kitty Katt will entertain, inform, and inspire you with their infectious passion and deep appreciation for the franchise.

So set your phasers to "subscribe" and join Stuart and Natasha on "The Red Alert Podcast," your weekly destination for all things Star Trek. Live long and podcast!
author_name: Stuart Gilmartin and Natasha Kitty Katt

description: Join host of the Scream Queer Podcast, Ralph Anthony every Thursday night as he leads you on a captivating journey through a world that is both frightening and unsettling. Each episode of this spin off offers something truly terrifying, sharing sleep stories of topics including True Crime, horror fiction, and encounters with the paranormal. Whether you’re looking to wind down or slip into darkness. Prepare yourself for the scariest slumber of your life.

title: Mancave101Podcast
description: Mancave101Podcast was started by six nerds who love Comic Books, Movies and other pop culture and collectibles. On our weekly podcast episodes we bring you comics of the week, nerdy news & celebrity gossip, Movie trailers, inside information on coming events and TV show reviews . We don't always agree with each other, and that's usually where the conversation gets INTERESTING!! . Tune in every Thursdays at 8:00 PM Eastern to have some fun, talk some ish and hear what we think about the status of the nerd multiverse! -- oh and bring a drink!!
